channel.title: How do I add drops on a delta?
channel.description:
Im trying to learn the basics once more, cause I havent been coding in like 2½ years.. Can someone be kind and give me a tip? (on how to change or add drops)
EDIT:
Nevermind, if anyone else needs help with this, you go to your Config folder, and scroll down to NPCdrops.cfg
i lolled when i saw the file tbh.

item.title: How do I add drops on a delta?
item.dc:creator: @Darknitepk10 Darknitepk10
item.description:
@Darknitepk10 wrote:

Go to config folder and open npcdrops.cfg then add something like
Id Item Quantity % of drop
npcdrop = 50 1077 1 1

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add drops on a delta?
